name: Dark Voetbalprimeur
css:
@-moz-document domain("voetbalprimeur.nl") {
/* blue background replacement */
header#head .top_content,
.right_body aside .block .widgethead,
footer
{
    background: #222 !important;
}

/* darkest background */
html, body, main
{
	background-color: #000 !important;
}

/* darker background */
header#head nav .overflow_wrap,
main .content article,
main .content .react form.post_comment,
main .content .main_content .news li.latest-gallery .frame,
main .content div#vp_comments,
main .content .main_content .news li,
main .content .main_content .news.small li#media,
main .content .poll,
main .content .main_content.video_overview ul li,
main .content .career .row,
main .main_content.league_overview ul,
main .content .rumors_bar,
main .content .static_page,
.right_body aside #list_response .photo_popular ul,
.right_body aside .ui-tabs #stats_tabs,
.gpblog-widget li,
.photo_popular ul,
.video_popular_list a
{
	background-color: #111 !important;
}

/* lighter background */
textarea,
.content_filter,
section.main.chat-wrapper #chat.box,
section.main.chat-wrapper #chat.box .form-container .reply-answer,
aside.top,
.container .mc_date_filter,
.container .matchcenter .main .matches .type,
.container .matchcenter .main .matches .match,
main .main_content.league_overview .featured h3,
main .main_content.league_overview .country h3,
main .content .top_block .player_left,
main .content .main_content .subheader,
main .content .player_index .top_block .tag_search,
main .content .player_index .top_block .tag_search input[type="search"],
main .content #rumours h1,
main .content .static_page .heading,
main .club_top_name,
main .content .top_block .club_right
{
	background-color: #222 !important;
}

/* text */
*,
.content_filter,
header#head nav .overflow_wrap,
header#head nav ul li a,
header#head nav ul li.active a,
main .content article h1,
main .content .react form.post_comment textarea,
main .content .main_content .news li .information .time,
main .content .poll h2,
main .content .poll form p > span,
main .content .main_content.video_overview ul li,
main .content #rumours h1,
.right_body aside .block .widgethead,
.right_body aside #list_response .photo_popular ul li p,
.gpblog-widget a p

{
	color: #bbb !important;
}

/* links */
section.content a,
main .content article .tags a,
main .content .main_content .news li .information a .title,
.right_body aside #list_response .photo_popular ul a.more_tabs
{
	color: #4d74d1 !important;
}

/* dark border color */
header#head nav ul::after, header#head nav ul::before,
header#head nav .overflow_wrap_third,
.gpblog-widget li,
main .content div#vp_comments,
main .content div#vp_comments .response .body,
main .content .main_content .news.small li#media,
main .content .react form.post_comment,
main .content .react form.post_comment textarea,
main .content .main_content .news li.latest-gallery .frame,
main .content .poll,
main .content .main_content.video_overview ul li,
main .main_content.league_overview .featured h3,
main .main_content.league_overview .country h3,
main .main_content.league_overview ul,
main .main_content.league_overview ul li.league,
main .content .top_block .player_left,
main .content .player_index .top_block .tag_search,
main .content .career,
main .content .career .row,
main .content #rumours h1,
main .content .single_rumor,
main .content .static_page .heading,
main .content .static_page article,
main .club_top_name,
main .content .top_block .club_right,
main .content .top_block .club_right .top_table,
main .content .club_top_table h1, 
main .content .top_block .club_right .top_table h1,
section.main.chat-wrapper,
section.main.chat-wrapper #chat.box .title,
section.main.chat-wrapper #chat.box .reply-form .top_chat,
.right_body aside .block,
.right_body aside #list_response .photo_popular,
.right_body aside #list_response .photo_popular ul li,
.right_body aside .block_valued ul li,
.right_body aside #list_response .photo_popular ul a.more_tabs,
.right_body aside .video_popular_list,
.right_body aside .video_popular_list .video.first,
.right_body aside .video_popular_list .video.first:last-child article,
.right_body aside .ui-tabs #stats_tabs ul li.ui-state-default,
aside.top,
.container .mc_date_filter,
.container .matchcenter .main .matches .competition-wrapper,
.container .matchcenter .main .matches .match,
#stats_tabs,
#stats_tabs li a
{
    border-color: #444 !important;
}

/* light border color */
.content_filter,
main .content div#vp_comments .response .body .moderate .thumbs,
main .content div#vp_comments .response .body .moderate .flag,
main .content div#vp_comments .response .body .moderate .react,
main .content article .tags,
main .content article .tags .tags_icon,
main .content .main_content .news li,
main .content .single_rumor .vote_react .rumor_respond,
main .club_top_name .follow_player .followers,
aside .box[data-type="competitionFilterBox"] .select,
aside .live-filter ul,
aside .live-filter ul li:first-of-type
{
    border-color: #666 !important;
}


}
